sentences.sentence: Look at Borneo, where you instantly think of the orang-utans.
sentences.translation: 看到婆罗洲，你立刻就会想到猩猩。

sentences.sentence: Orang Utans are highly intelligent apes and can be found wild on the islands of Borneo and Sumatra.
sentences.translation: 红毛猩猩是高度智能化的类人猿，可以发现在这些岛屿上的野生婆罗洲和苏门答腊岛。

sentences.sentence: WHEN it comes to researching intelligence in primates, chimpanzees and orang-utans get all the attention.
sentences.translation: 当人们研究灵长类动物的智力水平的时候，所有的注意力都集中在黑猩猩和猩猩上。
